messages.content:
I've had enough and I'm pretty sure you have too... I've lived in Eastleigh for 30 years and this is the worst it has been. It's time for someone local to take over, drive change and get things done for our community.

Together, we can ensure that Eastleigh doesn't suffer as the Tories hide the truth behind a Brexit smokescreen. Your vote for me is a vote for Eastleigh, and together we will:

- Increase police presence and demand an Eastleigh police station
- Improve our vital infrastructure and services (roads, doctors, schools)
- Rejuvenate and revitalise our high streets
- Support the right kind of housing developments
- Give you, the people of Eastleigh, a voice!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Enhance services like roads, doctors, and schools

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Rejuvenate and revitalise our high streets
Support the right kind of housing developments
Give you, the people of Eastleigh, a voice
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that community voices are heard

nonPolicyAttributes.localness:
Grew up on Passfield Avenue in a single parent family during the rise of New Labour
Currently living in central Eastleigh amongst lifelong friends and family
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Worked for numerous local businesses, including Eastleigh College
nonPolicyAttributes.education: Attended Norwood and Alderman Quilley schools respectively
